text:
ねぇ
僕 今
すっごく
楽しい!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 18.67%;top: 52.44%;width: 8.51%;height: 13.78%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
お気に
召して
頂けて
光栄です!
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 30.27%;top: 83.17%;width: 8.83%;height: 12.20%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 40.48%;top: 79.63%;width: 6.17%;height: 9.02%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
いえ…
彼が私を
知っている
だけです…
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 59.31%;top: 55.24%;width: 10.43%;height: 11.59%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
彼は何年も…
私に興味が
あるみたい
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 70.59%;top: 83.29%;width: 9.57%;height: 12.93%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
